html.p: You round the coastline of Corpse Bay and arrive in Rentarn. 2 is added to your Time Track. This is a trading outpost where fur-trappers and hunters mix with fishermen and, you have no doubt, some Sword Coast pirates. Frost is forming on the wooden roofs of the town's warehouses, taverns and homes even as you look. Dour-faced people are hurrying through the cold, to get home to their suppers and burning wood fires! Will you:

td.a: Try to buy some extra equipment or food?
Head straight for the Rudderless Galley tavern?
Try to buy some extra equipment or food?
Head straight for the Rudderless Galley tavern?
